item.title: Buffalo Bill, Hero of the Far West
item.description: Buffalo Bill, Hero of the Far West is a 1964 Italian spaghetti western directed by Mario Costa.

item.title: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive
item.description: Buckaroo: The Winchester Does Not Forgive is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Adelchi Bianchi and starring Dean Reed.

item.title: They Call Me Trinity
item.description: They Call Me Trinity is a 1970 Italian Spaghetti Western comedy film written and directed by Enzo Barboni and produced by Italo Zingarelli. The film stars Terence Hill and Bud Spencer as two brothers, Trinity and Bambino, who help defend a Mormon settlement from Mexican bandits and the henchman of the land-grabbing Major Harriman. It was filmed on location in Lazio, Italy, with financial backing from West Film.

item.title: Vengeance Is My Forgiveness
item.description: Vengeance Is My Forgiveness is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film written and directed by Roberto Mauri.
